product.title: INSMART 2-in-1 Hair Straightener and Curler, Ceramic Flat Iron with Dual Ionic Technology for Shinier & Smoother Hair, 72H Long-Lasting Style, Adjustable Temperature
product.description:
Transform your hair styling routine with our INSMART 2-in-1 Hair Straightener and Curler. Designed for effortless use, this ceramic flat iron combines advanced dual ionic technology with fast heating capabilities to deliver shinier, smoother, and frizz-free hair. Whether you're looking to create sleek straight locks or bouncy curls, this versatile tool is perfect for all hair types. With its user-friendly design, including a 360° rotating cord and heat-resistant casing, styling has never been easier or safer. Achieve salon-quality results at home and enjoy long-lasting styles that stay beautiful for up to 72 hours.

Color: three colors
Rated voltage: 220V
Rated power: 50Hz
Host size: 280*30*23mm
Heating panel: 25*100mm
Gear adjustment: 2 gears
Heating material: heating film
Switch mode: one key start
Display mode: LED light

product.description_full:
Transform your hair styling routine with our INSMART 2-in-1 Hair Straightener and Curler. Designed for effortless use, this ceramic flat iron combines advanced dual ionic technology with fast heating capabilities to deliver shinier, smoother, and frizz-free hair. Whether you're looking to create sleek straight locks or bouncy curls, this versatile tool is perfect for all hair types. With its user-friendly design, including a 360° rotating cord and heat-resistant casing, styling has never been easier or safer. Achieve salon-quality results at home and enjoy long-lasting styles that stay beautiful for up to 72 hours.

Color: three colors
Rated voltage: 220V
Rated power: 50Hz
Host size: 280*30*23mm
Heating panel: 25*100mm
Gear adjustment: 2 gears
Heating material: heating film
Switch mode: one key start
Display mode: LED light * 2-in-1 Versatility: Straighten or curl your hair with one tool, perfect for creating multiple styles effortlessly.
 * Dual Ionic Technology: Infuses hair with negative ions to reduce frizz, enhance shine, and repair damage for healthier-looking hair.
 * 72H Long-Lasting Style: Enjoy sleek straight hair or bouncy curls that stay flawless for up to 72 hours.
 * Fast & Easy Styling: Heats up in just 30 seconds with 2 adjustable temperature settings for customized styling on all hair types.
 * Safe & User-Friendly Design: Features a heat-resistant casing, 360° rotating cord, and simple one-clip operation for hassle-free use.Heating film material.

protection_plans.title: Walmart Protection Plan - 3-Year Plan
protection_plans.description: Protect it today, enjoy it for years. Get award-winning Allstate service and support that goes above and beyond the manufacturer’s warranty. Health & beauty plans cover: Mechanical & electrical failures Breakdowns or failures during normal use Fast repairs & replacements with easy online claims available 24/7Includes 100% parts & labor with no hidden fees When you add your new health & beauty item to cart, be sure to add a Walmart Protection Plan, too. Simply add your plan at checkout. There’s no need to register your plan for it to be active. We’ll email you protection plan details after you check out.
